1. Mom, throughout life, you have been my haven. Thanks to your valuable advice and stout character, I have had the best experiences in life. 'Happy birthday!'

2. With a loving heart and a warm embrace, I send my birthday wishes to the best mother in the world. Have the best one yet.

 3.Today will always be a constant reminder that not all heroes wear capes. Through the good and bad, you have held us down. Have a blast today. Happy birthday, dear mom.

 4.There is no one in the whole wide world, that could take your place in my heart. I count myself lucky to have you. Happy birthday, dearest mother.

 5.You’re the precious gift heaven has given to me and I just want to celebrate you over and over again. Happy birthday, mom.

 6. Mom, you’re exceptional and phenomenal in every aspect, I just want you to have a day as phenomenal as you are. Happy birthday my first love.
